books.author: by Anthony Bourdain
books.description: A memoir-exposé of the restaurant world. Originally published in 2000.
books.name: KITCHEN CONFIDENTIAL

books.author: by David Sedaris
books.description: A collection of comedic stories on mortality, middle age and a beach house dubbed the Sea Section.
books.name: CALYPSO

books.author: by Jon Meacham
books.description: The present political climate is contextualized through the lens of difficult moments in American history.
books.name: THE SOUL OF AMERICA

books.author: by David Grann
books.description: The story of a murder spree in 1920s Oklahoma that targeted Osage Indians, whose lands contained oil.
books.name: KILLERS OF THE FLOWER MOON

books.author: by Anthony Ray Hinton with Lara Love Hardin
books.description: A wrongfully imprisoned man on death row becomes a beacon to his fellow inmates.
books.name: THE SUN DOES SHINE

books.author: by Newt Gingrich
books.description: The former speaker of the House’s views on the achievements of and obstacles facing the current administration.
books.name: TRUMP'S AMERICA

books.author: by Michael Pollan
books.description: A personal account of how psychedelics might help the mentally ill and people dealing with everyday challenges.
books.name: HOW TO CHANGE YOUR MIND

books.author: by Dan Abrams and David Fisher
books.description: The 1859 courtroom battle in which Abraham Lincoln defended the murderer of his protégé.
books.name: LINCOLN'S LAST TRIAL

books.author: by Ben Rhodes
books.description: A memoir by the former speechwriter and deputy national security advisor to President Obama.
books.name: THE WORLD AS IT IS

books.author: by John McCain and Mark Salter
books.description: A memoir by the Republican senator from Arizona.
books.name: THE RESTLESS WAVE

books.author: by Tara Westover
books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university.
books.name: EDUCATED

books.author: by Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species.
books.name: SAPIENS

books.author: by John Carreyrou
books.description: The rise and fall of Theranos, the biotech startup that failed to deliver on its promise to make blood testing more efficient.
books.name: BAD BLOOD

books.author: by Hans Rosling with Ola Rosling and Anna Rosling Ronnlund
books.description: A look at our biases and the argument for why the world is in a better state than we might think.
books.name: FACTFULNESS

books.author: by Bret Baier and Catherine Whitney
books.description: The Fox News anchor describes Ronald Reagan’s 1988 visit to the Soviet capital.
books.name: THREE DAYS IN MOSCOW
